                 Devil May Cry IV
			
 Devil May CryÃ‚Â® 4 immerses gamers in a gothic supernatural world, where
 a new protagonist clashes with a familiar hero. As the new leading man, 
 Nero, players will unleash incredible attacks and non-stop combos using 
 a unique new gameplay mechanic, his powerful "Devil Bringer" arm. 
	
 Release name..........: Devil.May.Cry.IV.MacOSX.Ni7r0geN
 Publisher.............: Capcom
 Final Size............: 8.29 GB
 Platform..............: Mac OSX 10.9 and greater.
 Protection............: None
 Wrapper Rating........: Premium (Native level or better)

 			Intructions:
1. Unpack and drag to whatever folder and play.
2. Configured full XBox360 gamepad support with Tattiebogle driver
   installed on the system (gamnepad must be turned on before starting 
   the game).
3. Requires an ATI Radeon HD 2400 or better / NVidia 8600M or better.
   Default video configuration 1280x720 (windowed), adjust to fullscreen
   and/or to your resolution in options inside the game.
4. The image is ultra compressed, so be patient when opening the dmg
   file.
5. GPU's:
	- NVidia: OK.
	- AMD Radeon: Not tested.
	- Intel: Not tested.
6. Adjust the graphics configuration accordingly to your GPU capacity.
7. If you like the game, buy it and support the developers
